meanings.definition: The state or quality of being malodorous.
meanings.sent1: The malodorousnesses of the garbage made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The malodorousnesses of the old socks filled the room with an unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent3: Despite its malodorousnesses, the skunk seemed quite proud of its unique scent.
meanings.sent4: The malodorousnesses of the swamp hung in the air like a heavy fog.
meanings.sent5: The malodorousnesses of the fish market lingered long after I left.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a bad smell.
meanings.sent1: The malodorousnesses of the trash bin were overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The malodorousnesses of the sewage plant could be detected from far away.
meanings.sent3: The malodorousnesses of the cheese made the cat wrinkle its nose in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The malodorousnesses of failure clung to him like a foul cloud.
meanings.sent5: The malodorousnesses of the alley made me hurry past to escape the stench.
